parameters.name: SSLPub
parameters.description: The public key of the SSL certificate. You must Base64-encode the public key before you invoke the encodeURIComponent function to encode a URI component. The public key must be in the PEM format.

parameters.name: SSLStatus
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to return only domain names with HTTPS enabled or disabled.

*   **true**: returns only domain names with HTTPS enabled.
*   **false**: The rule is disabled.
